Imagine AI clones you, not just your voice. We build you online with high-fidelity personas that replicate how you think, write, and sell - so our AI can handle your entire B2B content pipeline: posts, strategic comments, blogs and content engineering to achieve content-market fit.

For B2B service firms and YC companies, this means turning founders' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to create content, our forward-deployed content engineers perform deep research to understand who you are -> your voice, your clients' pain points, your unique insights -> then ship and optimize content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher who dropped out to build this). 

We launched in November, now serve 40+ paying customers (Series-A,B and seed stage companies plus VCs, global franchises, and ghostwriting agencies). Achieving minimum 30%-70% week to week growth.

üí° Results:
$20 M+ total revenue generated across clients
$5 M deal closed from a single LinkedIn post
$40 K inbound revenue in 1.5 weeks for one client
200+ qualified inbounds in 1 month after hitting content-market fit

We‚Äôre not just another AI tool.

We‚Äôre forward-deployed content engineers, building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company.

üìÖ Book a demo: https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost

üîó Connect with Sky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/

name: Anto Biosciences
description: A Foundation Model for Microbial Communities.
long_description:
Anto is building a foundation model for microbial communities, making the gut microbiome computable for the first time. We predict drug toxicity and efficacy across diverse populations and fix drugs so they work for everyone ‚Äî solving the hidden root cause of most drug failures. 

Founded by Arvid (Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard; Nature-published researcher who pioneered quality-aware, goal-directed sparsification) and David (Harvard Medical School Gastroenterology, J&J), second-time founders who published the breakthrough at leading machine learning AI conferences and Nature.

name: Patent Watch
description: AI for detecting patent infringements
long_description:
We automate patent infringement detection. Our software interprets patents, identifies competing products, and generates claim charts showing who‚Äôs infringing and how.

Teams use us to:

- Find licensing and litigation targets
- Send cease-and-desist letters
- Find counter litigation
- Sell IP in wind-downs
- Accelerate M&A diligence

We also run AI invalidity and prior-art searches to help your patents hold up in court.

Companies spend up to $50k to file and maintain a single patent over its lifetime, but once it's granted, they let it collect dust. With Patent Watch, you can start turning your patent portfolio into revenue in 10 minutes.

name: s2.dev
description: API for unlimited, durable, real-time streams
long_description:
S2 is a serverless datastore for real-time, streaming data.

The more we worked on data systems, the more we felt like there was a missing building block. The seamless experience of object storage simply did not exist for durable streams ‚Äì so we set out to fix that!

S2 reimagines streams as an unlimited and access-controlled web resource. Like if Kafka and S3 had a baby.

- Building agents? Use granular streams to persist context in real time, make workflows auditable, and coordinate between agents.

- Publishing fast-moving data? Streams support high fanout and can be accessed directly over the internet, so they are a great fit for broadcasting real-time feeds.

- Sandboxing? Emit to per-instance streams, and read history or live events just as easily.

- Local-first and multiplayer experiences? Propagate updates reliably and efficiently.

Stop dealing with clusters, and start streaming.

name: Tornyol
description: We build micro-drones that kill mosquitoes.
long_description: Tornyol builds micro-drones that kill mosquitoes. We use smartphone microphones, car park assist sensors and some clever DSP and control to transform 40-gram toy drones into mosquito killers. Because these drones are so cheap and fast, we will lower the cost of mosquito control by 100x which will enable the eradication of mosquitoes from cities, saving more than a million people each year from Malaria, West Nile, Dengue, etc.

name: Nucleo
description: The first Agentic platform for Oncology
long_description:
We help oncologists and radiologists extract insights from CT scans to support tumor characterization and treatment.

The hospitals we work with include Stanford Hospital, Cedars-Sinai (the largest hospital in California), UCI Health, and Weill Cornell.

name: Leadbay
description: Discover and qualify SMB leads that couldn't be found before.
long_description:
Leadbay (YC F25) discovers and qualifies SMB leads that couldn't be found before. Small-to-enterprise teams use us to prospect the most low-data-low-signals industries like construction, hospitality, even startups.

Co-founders are Milan Stankovic (CTO) - PhD to make AI work with limited data, and Ludovic Granger (CEO). 

Try us on leadbay.ai.

name: Pixley AI
description: The first platform where parents & kids can co-create AI cartoon shows
long_description:
Pixley is the first platform where kids can turn their drawings and ideas into fully animated cartoons in minutes. In just 3 weeks after launch, over 1000 families across 75 countries have already started creating stories.

We‚Äôre starting with a clear wedge: personalized kids‚Äô entertainment. Parents are tired of overstimulating, low-value content from YouTube and Netflix. Pixley gives them safe and personalized stories that encourage learning and imagination.

But kids‚Äô cartoons are just the beginning. As video generation improves, all video content will shift from manual production to being personalized and generated. Our long-term goal is to build the AI Netflix: a platform where shows and movies aren‚Äôt recommended, but instead generated around each viewer‚Äôs interests and habits.

We‚Äôre 19 year old CS dropouts who‚Äôve known each other since elementary school and won 4 hackathons at 15. After seeing AI flood the internet with low-quality content, we created Pixley ‚Äì¬†a safe, personalized way for kids to turn their ideas into animated stories.

name: Cortex AI
description: Large-scale real-world robot & human data for embodied AI
long_description:
Cortex AI builds the world‚Äôs most diverse and large-scale real-world workplace robot & egocentric dataset ‚Äî where the physical world becomes the next training and evaluation set for embodied AI.

We power frontier labs developing robotics foundation models and general-purpose robots by providing the data they need:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Egocentric Data ‚Äî real-workplace human video with hand/body pose, depth, and subtask labels.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Robot Data ‚Äî trajectories collected from manipulators and humanoids in real industry settings.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Human-in-the-Loop Rollouts & Evals ‚Äî real-world deployments with remote operators who recover robots when they fail, capturing data that feeds back into training and continuously improves models.

Additionally, through the Cortex Marketplace, workplaces get paid to host data-collection and evaluation sessions, while labs access the in-the-wild data that truly matters. This draws on Lucas‚Äôs previous experience as co-founder of Carousell, a C2C marketplace that scaled to a $1B+ valuation.

name: Inspector
description: AI IDE for front-end development
long_description:
Inspector helps front-end engineers ship faster with AI by automating the most frustrating part of the job ‚Äî gathering context between the browser and the codebase.

Inspector is an AI IDE for front-end that connects your browser and codebase. Inspector lets you select elements visually and prompt changes, giving coding agents access to the same runtime context developers have: visuals, elements, and logs. 

With Inspector, you‚Äôre editing right in the front-end, not buried under tabs and screenshots.

name: Thesis
description: The AI discovery engine.
long_description:
Thesis is building the engine for discovery. Our aim is to help uncover the next AlphaFold or build the next Transformer, faster, more systematically, and at scale. We treat discovery not as a matter of luck, but as an engineering challenge to be solved.

Thesis lets anyone build powerful machine learning models for anything they can imagine. The mission is to democratize invention by putting machine intelligence in everyone‚Äôs hands.

Every major breakthrough in the next decade, in science, industry, or AI, will be built on systems like Thesis. 

We intend to define that category.

name: Oxus
description: AI-powered automation for internal audit workflows
long_description:
Oxus automates internal audits for pre-IPO and public companies using AI. We turn hours of manual scoping, documentation, and control testing into review-ready outputs generated within minutes.
 
With Oxus, audit teams deliver more audits, faster.

name: Play Health
description: Perimenopause Care Platform
long_description:
Play Health is building a perimenopause care platform to provide women and their providers with the tools they need to relieve symptoms fast. It is led by technical, second-time, YC-backed founders Andrea Mazzocchi, PhD and Ian Miller, with an exit and a unicorn between them.

Over 30 million women in the U.S. are experiencing perimenopause symptoms, spending an estimated $15B+ annually on symptom management.  Despite this most only receive generic solutions and struggle to find effective symptom relief.

We're bringing evidence-based perimenopause care to women through partnerships with medical practices and employer and health benefits programs. Our platform integrates personalized symptom, medication, and lifestyle data to generate AI-powered insights and  clinical protocols, enabling providers to deliver specialized care.

Every clinical interaction enriches our longitudinal dataset allowing us to create better outcomes for patients, deeper insights for providers, and expand into women‚Äôs health broadly. This also enables us to partner with pharma and biotech companies developing therapeutics and diagnostics for women's health.

name: Casey
description: Casey automates workflows for the insurance industry
long_description: Casey is the fastest way for commercial insurance brokers to submit complex risks. We automate client data collection, build risk profiles, and prepare carrier-ready submissions for wholesalers and underwriters in minutes.

name: Selfin
description: Building the first AI Bank
long_description: Selfin is developing AI-powered banking. Users can enjoy personalised recommendations and optimisations of their finances by connecting all their financial products on a single platform.

name: Compyle
description: The coding agent that actually collaborates with you
long_description:
Compyle is a less autonomous coding agent that asks before it acts. We're like Cursor or Claude Code - but you won't need to rewrite your codebase every time you use it for more than a small task.

We built Compyle because we were frustrated with the direction other coding agents are headed. They're all racing to be more autonomous, running for hours without human input.

This doesn't work for real production code. When agents run autonomously, they make countless small decisions that pile up in your codebase. Engineers lose ownership - they don't know what was implemented, can't effectively debug or maintain it, and struggle to build on top of it. The code becomes a black box, and they're forced to throw it away.

Compyle keeps engineers in the driver's seat.

name: Lexi
description: AI Associates for Corporate Law
long_description: At Lexi, we are building AI associates for Corporate Law. Our associates learn your firm's standards and improve with every case, having already handled 135,000+ documents across 7,000+ cases.

name: Codyco
description: The AI Reservation Team for Hotel Groups
long_description:
‚Ç¨5,000 in additional bookings. In 4 weeks. For a 53-room hotel.

We help hotel groups turn missed calls into bookings.

This it how it works: 

- They send their missed calls to us.
- Our AI answers and takes the booking.
- The booking goes right into their PMS.

Even with call centers and central reservation departments they are still losing 5% of calls. 

That is a seven figure revenue leak. 

Why us? 
We used to build software that can‚Äôt fail for massive companies. We started Codyco after a friend told us how much money he was losing from missed calls. We built the first version just for him.

Now we give hotel groups the reliable AI they need, so they never lose a booking on the phone again.

name: ComplyDo
description: Global Compliance for Enterprises
long_description:
The most flexible enterprise compliance engine that makes GRC teams 10x more efficient. Already trusted by global leaders and the largest EU enterprises.

What it does:
- Extracts requirements from any file
- Maps them to controls and policies
- Shows gaps and monitors changes
- Advises on maturity and next steps

name: Bravi

long_description:
Bravi is building the AI operating system for home-services businesses, using AI-powered customer communication as the wedge.

We replace the front office (calls, chats, follow-ups) with AI agents that never miss a lead, then layer an internal AI copilot that understands products, pricing, and technical documentation.

We started with fenestration (shutters, windows, garage doors), a large, complex vertical with no modern software, before expanding to adjacent trades.

Bravi is already live with leading installers and manufacturers across Europe and the US, turning missed demand into revenue.

name: Rovr

long_description: Rovr streamlines engineering operations by automating intake, triage, routing, and cross-team coordination. It replaces internal forms, manual Slack triage, and scattered docs with an AI front desk that understands requests, assigns owners, updates context, and posts status changes directly into Slack. Rovr‚Äôs built-in ops CRM gives teams a single system of record for eng requests ‚Äî from tooling access to platform incidents to dev-infra workflows ‚Äî reducing operational drag across the entire org.

name: Sunflower
description: Building the Sobriety Platform for the future of Superintelligence. üåª
long_description:
Sunflower is on a mission to create one trillion days sober. Our product is both a consumer app (think a "Duolingo for addiction") but also with a tele-therapy clinic inside. 

Consumer App: 
- We built the #1 AI Sponsor for any kind of addiction
- Beautiful visual progression tracking to power the core "task to be done" of addiction
- A twitter style social media for addicts 
- DIY learn content (think Masterclass for addiction) for all major addiction types 
- CBT based journaling exercises 

Tele-Therapy: 
- Think a "Early Medical Peter Attia" quality of clinic, but completely focused on addiction 
- Starting with talk therapy in CA & TX we're rolling out to all 50 states + MAT 
- Bringing together the worlds best doctors to create the most effective protocol for addiction 

Sunflower went from 0 - 100k MAU in less than 6 months, and now we're continuing the traction to create the #1 product for addiction for the 1.2B humans on this planet that struggle with this fundamental human problem.

name: Captain
description: The High Accuracy RAG API
long_description:
Captain delivers the most accurate general-purpose retrieval engine for unstructured data.

Connect file stores and effortlessly retrieve knowledge with much higher accuracy than RAG (Avg: 78% ‚Üí 95% + citations).

name: Redapto
description: Self-improving systems for Customer Support Teams
long_description:
Redapto builds self-improving systems for customer support teams that boost CSAT, NRR, and drive repeat purchases.

Support quality plateau because agents and QA are static. Less than 5% of interactions are reviewed, missing SOP gaps, hallucinations, and outdated knowledge. Redapto audits 100% of interactions to detect issues, run custom evals, and auto-update SOPs, training, and knowledge bases so teams continuously improve.

We‚Äôre applied researchers who‚Äôve shipped this at scale. At Coinbase, our agent automations save $2.5M+ annually; at Adobe and Amazon, our post-training and compression work saved $1M+ and improved latency 20√ó.

name: Articulate
description: Automatic Construction Drawing Clash Detection
long_description:
We help construction teams eliminate rework, delays, and drawing confusion before construction starts.We analyze PDF plans, detect clashes and inconsistencies across disciplines, and create draft RFIs so teams can resolve issues early.

This saves construction companies hundreds of hours and millions of dollars.

What we do:
- Automatically detect clashes, missing information, and drawing mismatches
- Align architectural, structural, and MEP plans so everything matches across sheets
- Generate draft RFIs from issues we find
- Replace long page-turn meetings with instant drawing analysis
- Reduce rework and prevent schedule delays before boots hit the ground

We integrate with:Procore, Autodesk, email, and the tools teams already use

Teams use us to:
- Save hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars per project
- Catch design and coordination issues early
- Reduce RFIs and prevent field fixes
- Keep projects on schedule with fewer surprises

Contact us at founders@usearticulate.com

name: Aleph Lab
description: AI language buddy in the games kids love
long_description: An AI companion that chats and plays with children inside games like Minecraft, helping them learn a new language while they play. Kids already spend hours each week in their favorite games, and now parents can turn that game time into learning time.

name: Logical
description: A proactive desktop copilot. Clippy, but actually good.
long_description: Logical is a desktop AI that acts as a proactive and largely promptless copilot, designed to reduce the friction of using AI for everyday tasks. It transfers context across apps, and allows taking action on many apps with just a few clicks. Logical can assist with drafting emails, writing docs, noting meetings and can even automatically detect action items. Need to prompt? Logical can understand intent in much fewer words than a regular chatbot. Plus, user data is never sent to Logical servers. Logical is the AI resurrection of Clippy, but actually good.

name: Agentic Fabriq

Through Fabriq, any employee can tap into AI/agents with exactly the data and tools they're cleared to use by an admin. Fabriq can be used internally with employees or externally for customers while handling the auth + integrations + permissions securely for you.

name: Travo

long_description:
We are building the most accurate and comprehensive real estate data set for RV parks and similar niche asset classes.

Travo is the one stop shop for anyone working in real estate to search any property or parcel of land and instantly access rental comps, ownership, zoning and financials. With our data, we build the best informed AI applications for real estate private equity firms, developers, and brokers.

name: Tensr
description: Fully autonomous robotic factories
long_description: Tensr is building fully autonomous robotic factories that make scaling hardware as effortless as scaling on AWS. We‚Äôre a group of Berkeley graduate robotics researchers who previously won a full scale autonomous IndyCar competition at 160mph.

name: Kestrel AI
description: AI-Native Cloud Incident Response Platform
long_description: Kestrel is an AI-native cloud incident response platform that brings self-healing to cloud infrastructure. It monitors cloud and kubernetes infrastructure 24/7, finds root causes, and generates exact fixes - so incidents get resolved in seconds instead of hours.

name: Sanctum
description: Catch software issues with user simulations
long_description: Sanctum lets you launch new features to agents that mimic your real users. We build AI user models from your session recordings and run them against your changes to surface bugs, UX issues, and performance problems early.

name: LogosGuard
description: The risk management software for enterprises adopting AI
long_description: Enterprises are racing to adopt AI, but often don't have the right controls in place or know how to verify vendors are compliant. LogosGuard turns AI policies into executable controls, stress-tests your AI products, and continuously monitors changes, giving enterprises the confidence to scale AI responsibly.

name: Sciloop
description: AI Co-Scientist that automates ML experimentation and analysis.
long_description:
Sciloop is building an AI Co-Scientist that automates experimentation and analysis for machine learning researchers, allowing them to test ideas far faster than today‚Äôs tools allow. We are Bilal and Osman, International Physics Olympiad medalists and the only Pakistanis admitted to MIT in our respective years, with several years of hands-on ML research experience inside MIT CSAIL. We have built large-scale training pipelines, worked with terabyte-scale datasets, and seen the research bottleneck firsthand while contributing to scientific ML projects. We left MIT to solve this problem directly and are now building a system that can eventually accelerate scientific discovery itself.
https://sciloop.dev

name: Multifactor
description: Zero-trust authentication, authorization, and auditing for AI agents
long_description:
The agentic era is here, but its foundation is dangerously insecure. A growing number of high-profile "AI agent gone rogue" security incidents make headlines each week.

As enterprise adoption of agentic software has far outpaced the development of applicable cybersecurity solutions, CISOs have loudly voiced a growing need for verifiable, fine-grained security controls on complex multi-agent systems. That's why we built Multifactor.

Multifactor offers best-in-class authentication, authorization, and auditing technologies for agentic systems, allowing users to securely and revocably share online accounts with agents while maintaining fine-grained permissions and a detailed event history. We are doing for AI security what Cloudflare did for web security, Okta did for identity security, and Wiz did for cloud security: defining the category.

A world-class "account manager" that allows agents to securely use online accounts on your behalf is just the start‚Äîour early enterprise partners include companies using AI agents to manage $7.5+ billion manufacturing supply chains, where the consequences for lapses in security are severe. Our patented AI security technology seamlessly integrates with existing agentic software to thwart attacks like prompt injection, so CISOs and end users alike can breathe a sigh of relief, without slowing the pace of AI adoption.

name: Allus AI
description: Transforming manufacturing with our next-gen Vision Foundation Model
long_description: Allus builds next-gen vision foundation models that bring real intelligence to manufacturing. Enabling factories to see, understand, and improve production in real time.

name: Unsiloed AI
description: API for parsing multimodal unstructured data
long_description:
AI teams spend 6+ months building document workflows, yet fewer than 10% ever reach production. Generic LLM parsers and OCR collapse on multimodal documents with text, tables, images, and charts. Poor parsing and suboptimal chunking cripple RAG pipelines and downstream automation. Unsiloed AI has built state-of-the-art vision models which serves as the infrastructure layer for turning unstructured data into structured, queryable, and LLM-ready assets.

Our APIs are already parsing hundreds of thousands of documents for startups and NASDAQ-listed enterprises, powering vertical AI solutions across industries. On public benchmarks, Unsiloed AI consistently outperforms solutions from LlamaIndex, Gemini, Mistral, and Unstructured.io among others.

name: SF Tensor
description: Infrastructure for AI labs to focus on research.
long_description:
AI researchers should be pushing the boundaries of what's possible with new architectures and training methods. Instead, they waste weeks configuring cloud infrastructure, debugging distributed systems, and optimizing their GPU code. We know because we lived it: While training our own models across thousands of GPUs earlier this year, we spent more time fighting our infrastructure than doing actual research.

That why we're building two things. First, Elastic Cloud: a managed platform that automatically finds the cheapest GPUs across all providers, handles spot instance preemption, and cuts compute costs by up to 80%. Second, automatic kernel optimization that makes training code run faster by modeling hardware topology, often beating hand-tuned implementations.

The problem is that getting high performance across different hardware is genuinely hard. NVIDIA's CUDA moat exists because writing fast kernels requires deep expertise. Most teams either accept vendor lock-in or hire expensive kernel engineers. Our goal is to break the CUDA moat.

The compute bottleneck is the biggest constraint on AI progress. NVIDIA can't manufacture enough GPUs, and their monopoly keeps prices astronomical. Meanwhile, AMD, Google, and Amazon are shipping capable alternative hardware that nobody uses because the software is too hard. We're breaking that moat. If we succeed, anyone will be able to train state-of-the-art models without thinking past their PyTorch code.

name: AnswerThis
description: End-to-end workspace to accelerate scientific discovery
long_description:
AnswerThis is a scientific discovery platform used by over 200,000 researchers that reduces weeks of manual research work to hours. 

Instead of manually searching, reading, and organizing dozens of papers, researchers use AnswerThis to find the most relevant work, see how ideas are connected, and get comprehensive answers to complex scientific questions with line by line answers. 

This allows them to map research gaps, analyze trends, and draft literature reviews far faster, all while building a searchable library of their own research materials.

name: Nivara
description: The intelligence layer for how your teams use AI
long_description:
Nivara gives engineering leaders visibility into how humans and AI build together, helping teams spot bottlenecks, measure impact, and turn AI adoption into real outcomes.  

We're building the much needed copilot for Engineering Managers and empower every team to work intelligently with AI.

name: Lakonia
description: Delivering AI-powered situational awareness in tactical environments.
long_description: Lakonia is building an AI-powered command and control platform for law enforcement and the military. Our AI transcribes radio communications, analyzes them, and then synthesizes information for commanders/dispatchers and operators to act on.

name: SellRaze
description: The fastest way to sell online.
long_description:
SellRaze is an AI-powered selling assistant that helps anyone sell anything in seconds. Point your camera at any item and we'll identify it, price it, and create an engaging listing across multiple marketplaces, including our own.

Each day, more than 2,500 items are added to SellRaze, representing over $326,000 in inventory value.

name: Mod AI
description: Our AI Agents Replace Accounting Clerks
long_description:
We're building the agentic workforce that will replace the bottom half of the accounting org chart. Our agents imitate accounting clerks, taking charge of the entire workflow; vendor communication, fraud detection, invoice coding and exception handling. 

In just 49 days, we built a compliant platform from scratch and closed 6 enterprise contracts ($165k cARR), helping customers reduce labor costs by 83%. 4 of these customers are also participating in our seed round!

Evan & Jeet are previous founders from LinkedIn, Amazon, and Adyen, that met studying CS at UIUC.

name: Semble AI
description: Autonomous building-system design for construction companies.
long_description:
Semble AI builds AI agents that design building-systems (fire, HVAC, plumbing, security). Construction companies use Semble to cut down weeks on commercial and residential projects. 

The $600B building-system integration industry still runs on spreadsheets and manual drawings, even as building codes rapidly evolve and become more localized. It‚Äôs a massive blind spot for the tech world. 

Jonathan and Ethan met studying computer science at Stanford. Jonathan worked at Convergint, one of the world's largest building system integrators, specifically for the purpose of learning how this industry works. Ethan is obsessed for a different reason: His house burned down in 2017 due to a faulty fire system.

They are determined to make Semble the industry standard for construction design.

name: Flick
description: Figma + Cursor, for AI Filmmaking
long_description:
Flick is an AI filmmaking software that lets people create Hollywood-level short films completely using AI end-to-end.

There are many AI tools that can give you 8-second casual clips to post on social media, but when it comes to creating truly high-quality films with coherent storylines, consistent characters, and cinematic aesthetics, they don‚Äôt come close due to their lack of flexibility, creative control, and fragmented creative flow.

Founded by an award-winning filmmaker and a founding engineer at Instagram, Flick defines an interface specifically designed for native AI filmmaking that feels natural and enables end-to-end creative flows. Think of Flick as Figma for AI filmmaking.

There are 4 complete AI short films created using Flick that got 20+ awards in international film festivals already and our early creator residency community are generating several AI short films every week.

We are also building a community where we produce our own AI films as well as collaborating with other well-known filmmakers to share their ‚Äúbehind-the-scenes‚Äù workflows as resuable templates to inspire users in our community. We not only build product, we also build world-class content.

The whole film industry will be revolutionized by AI and our goal is to be ‚Äúthe product‚Äù that defines this category.

name: hillclimb
description: The world's first human superintelligence community
long_description: We derive training data from the world's brightest minds, enabling LLMs to achieve state-of-the-art model performance.

name: AtlasGrid
description: Accelerate Product Iteration
long_description: AtlasGrid automatically builds a visual graph of your mobile app UI and displays analytics directly on your screens. Additionally, our fleet of AI-powered agents will continuously analyze thousands of mobile apps, gathering design insights and identifying growth opportunities + actionable product improvements.

name: Wardstone
description: Satellites for Missile Defense
long_description: Wardstone is a space defense-tech company developing next-generation capabilities to protect the United States and its allies from missiles and other space-based threats. We design, build, and deploy satellites equipped with space-based interceptors to kinetically counter hypersonic and ballistic missiles.

name: Nessie
description: Shareable AI Brains for Everyone
long_description:
Nessie is building personal AI brains that augment human cognition.

Nessie turns your scattered AI conversations and documents into a shareable AI brain you actually own. It's a thinking partner that lets you instantly search your entire history of ideas, synthesize them into new insights, and watch your knowledge build on itself over time.

Right now, your best thinking is trapped in ephemeral AI chat histories. Nessie unifies your context from ChatGPT, Claude, and (soon) Apple Notes/Google Docs/Notion/other context sources, auto-organizing the mess into an AI-enhanced brain.

Next, we are unlocking sharing. Instead of sending a static doc, you will be able to send your "Product Strategy Brain" to a cofounder, or publish your "Research Brain" for your entire team to chat with.

Who it's for: AI-native thinkers‚Äîfounders, researchers, and writers‚Äîwho believe their best ideas should compound.

The Team: We are two Yale CS grads and former Amazon engineers building the tool we needed for ourselves. We combine Anna's obsession with neuroscience and augmenting human cognition with Tiger's lifelong passion for building products (he shipped an app with 70k+ users at age 13).

Traction: Launched 3 weeks ago. We have over 1,200 users who have imported 300,000+ AI conversations into Nessie. 30% week-over-week organic user growth.

Origin Story: Nessie was born after we hit the 1-million-token limit in multiple Gemini chats. Overnight, months of research disappeared. We realized the problem wasn't just about storage; it was that the medium for AI-native thought didn't exist yet. The chat window is a place to ask questions, not a place to build a mind.

Our Vision: We are building a new medium for personal intelligence. Everyone will have an AI brain on Nessie. You will use it to think better, remember more, and share your mind with the world.

name: Hypercubic
description: AI to maintain and modernize COBOL.
long_description:
Hypercubic is an AI-native maintenance and modernization platform for COBOL and mainframes.

We help enterprises understand and preserve their mission-critical legacy systems. About 70% of the Fortune 500 companies still rely on them to run their core business applications in banking, insurance, telecom, airlines, retail, and more.

These systems, originally built in the 1960s‚Äì90s, still power trillions in global infrastructure today but have become increasingly opaque as original developers retire or leave the workforce. 

We're laying the foundation to autonomously maintain and modernize these legacy systems to future-proof the backbone of the global economy.


Learn more at hypercubic.ai

name: Cranston AI
description: Full Stack AI Accounting Firm
long_description:
Cranston is a full stack AI accounting firm automating the $900b market for accounting labor. Our software automates reconciliation, tax compliance and financial analysis for startups & SMBs. We pull in context from all your company's apps & data, connect to existing systems of record and handle repetitive accounting work.

Our team is deep in the accounting space. Sean spent 5 years building an ERP after dropping out of Stanford and Max spent 5 years building an accounting firm that did every accounting workflow you can imagine on top of ERPs.

name: Questom
description: AI Agents for B2B Sales
long_description: We are building the agent first sales platform that will power sales for every single company soon. Join us to revolutionize how sales are done in the agent era.

name: Velum Labs
description: Firewall that controls access to information across AI and humans
long_description:
Velum is an open-source firewall for content-level access control across documents, databases, and applications. Admins define policies, and we apply them in real time across your entire stack to control what each recipient sees.

Our firewall sits between your data sources and consumers (LLMs, users, vendors), enforcing policies on every request. We understand meaning in text, documents, and databases to detect sensitive information based on your policies, then apply recipient-specific controls without blocking workflows.

Create policies in natural language. Teams write rules that define what's sensitive and who should access it, and Velum enforces them consistently across all systems. When authorization changes, we can reveal tokenized data just-in-time for approved recipients, maintaining both security and utility.

We integrate directly into your existing infrastructure. For AI workflows, we intercept prompts, responses, and retrievals to prevent sensitive information from leaking into or out of models. For enterprise systems like Salesforce, SAP, or Workday, we extend policy enforcement to exports, reports, and syncs.

Velum is designed for scale and compliance. We provide encryption and structure-preserving tokenization for high-throughput pipelines, with multi-cloud deployment options and configurable data residency per tenant to meet your compliance requirements.

name: Veria Labs
description: Continuous AI pentesting that finds and fixes vulnerabilities
long_description:
Veria Labs is developing AI agents that hack better than the best human hackers. Founded by members of the #1 US competitive hacking team, we've already found critical bugs in AI tools, operating systems, fintech and billion dollar crypto exchanges. 

Now we're scaling that expertise through AI-native security tooling that operates faster than human researchers while finding deeper, more complex vulnerabilities that traditional tools miss.

name: Iris
description: The Digital Extension of Yourself
long_description:
Iris observes how you handle your day - how you reply, decide, prioritize - and prepares the next set of actions. Our key insight: if you model real behavior, you can replicate judgment, not just tasks using personal agents and knowledge graphs. Iris knows what needs your attention across your accounts, pre-fills the actions, and you can simply swipe right to hand it off to your agent.

We started with connecting calendars and emails. We launched four weeks ago. Over 1,200 people have downloaded Iris, 168 use it every day, and they‚Äôve taken more than 36,000 actions so far growing 48% week over week.

In the future, everyone will have a personal proxy running their digital life with near perfect accuracy. Iris is the first real version of that future.

name: PlayVision
description: AI Moneyball for Sports
long_description:
PlayVision is the AI Moneyball for Sports: the future for scouting, recruiting, and playing the game.

Basketball teams upload their practices or games, and PlayVision uses AI and computer vision to automatically tag and analyze the film, giving coaches and scouts 10 times the information on their players and their opponents. PlayVision also uses algorithms to rank every single college and professional basketball player in the country with over 40 different metrics from tracking and play-by-play data. 

Check out our website at withplayvision.ai, and follow our instagram @playvisionai!

name: Koyal
description: Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform
long_description:
Koyal is an Agentic AI Filmmaking Platform that allows you to seamlessly convert script or audio into personalized, visually compelling stories. We‚Äôre a team from Carnegie Mellon, MIT and Meta, with experience in AI video generation.

https://koyal.ai builds directly upon our published research at the AI conference NeurIPS in December. We‚Äôve been covered in the international press for our patented secure personalization protocol CHARCHA: the genAI captcha.

Announcement: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965866965425348687
Demo: https://x.com/meh_agarwal/status/1965137062119752099


We currently have paid pilots with the biggest global music labels, podcasts and production houses, and just launched our public beta at beta.koyal.ai

We recently concluded a pilot with Universal Music and T-Series (world‚Äôs largest music label) alongside Bollywood production houses like Maddock Entertainment, and Collective Artists Network! As part of that, we launched 5 music videos for Grammy and Oscar winning artists like A R Rahman, Ricky Kej and Shankar Mahadevan all crossing 1.5 million views!

We've recently built SOTA capabilities in (i) multilingual script to audio to video, (ii) Agentic lip-sync with dynamic movement & (iii) Multi-character consistency.

name: Kaigo Health
description: AI outpatient care workforce
long_description: Kaigo Health provides an AI-powered outpatient care management platform that automates and scales remote care management for Medicare patients including post-discharge followups, ongoing check-ins, and monitoring. Using phone calls as an age-friendly interface, we aggregate patient responses, voice biomarkers, and remote patient monitoring data for powerful preventative and proactive healthcare.

name: Norra
description: Automating equipment operations for nursing facilities
long_description: Norra helps nursing facilities manage equipment operations. Every year, ~$80 billion are spent on medical equipment like beds, concentrators, and wheelchairs. Nursing facilities continue to operate with zero visibility which leads to $15 billion in equipment waste annually. We use physical trackers and AI agents to eliminate this.

name: Lunavo
description: Lunavo is the AI assistant for carriers.
long_description:
We build AI that runs carrier operations.

Lunavo is the AI assistant for carriers. It plugs directly into their existing toolstack, understands their processes, and monitors all incoming data and requests. Lunavo runs end-to-end backoffice operations, handling repetitive tasks, resolving issues autonomously, and escalating only what matters.

Lunavo helps carriers scale operations without scaling headcount.

name: Dari
description: An API to build the most reliable browser use agents
long_description:
A platform where users can automate web workflows using natural language prompts.

We handle deterministic playback of browser workflows and fall back to LLMs where necessary, ensuring reliability.

name: The Context Company
description: Semantic observability for AI agents to help teams fix failures fast
long_description:
Ship reliable agents with confidence.

AI agents often fail quietly, picking the wrong tools, looping, hallucinating, and more. The Context Company tells developers when and exactly where their agents fail so issues can be uncovered and fixed fast.

It combines traditional observability across traces, tool calls, latency, and costs with the ability to uncover silent failures that standard monitoring misses.

Get started with less than 10 lines of code.

name: Sorce
description: Tinder for jobs
long_description: Tinder for Jobs. Swipe right, AI applies on your behalf.

name: Caddy
description: The voice interface that works proactively for you
long_description:
Caddy is the operating system that works proactively for you. It learns how you work and acts on your behalf, keeping work moving while your context and voice stay intact.

Instead of producing generic AI output, Caddy creates real work artifacts that sound like you and fit how you actually work. Today, it operates across the tools you use every day, including email, calendar, Slack, Linear, and Notion.

Caddy is built by the team behind Loom‚Äôs AI and core product. We believe the next era of computing is software that understands intent, handles ambiguous work, and quietly gets work done in the background.

name: Alt-X
description: Automation for institutional-grade financial modeling in Excel
long_description:
Private-market investing still runs on Excel. Every year, trillions of dollars in venture, real estate, and private-equity capital are underwritten through manual spreadsheet work ‚Äî copying data from PDFs, CIMs, and data rooms into brittle models that haven‚Äôt fundamentally changed in decades.

Alt-X is building the AI infrastructure layer inside Excel for alternative assets. We ingest unstructured deal materials and automatically turn them into clean, auditable Excel models. Analysts can go from raw documents to a working underwriting model in minutes instead of rebuilding spreadsheets cell by cell.

Alt-X extracts and maps key KPIs like ARR, growth, NOI, IRR, leverage, and cap rate directly into Excel, then generates institutional-grade models, sensitivities, and IC-ready outputs that remain fully editable and transparent.

Teams using Alt-X reduce deal evaluation timelines by up to 70%, save 30‚Äì50 analyst hours per deal, and screen 4√ó more opportunities with the same headcount. By automating extraction, modeling, and error detection inside Excel, Alt-X turns underwriting from a manual bottleneck into a scalable workflow.

Our first wedge is real estate and private equity, where Excel underwriting is slowest and most painful. We‚Äôre already piloting with family offices and private funds managing over $200M in assets. Alt-X is priced as a SaaS product starting at $30/month, with higher tiers for teams and advanced workflows.

The opportunity is massive: over $1.4T in private-market deals are underwritten globally each year, with $25‚Äì30B spent on diligence and analytics ‚Äî nearly all of it manual and Excel-based. Alt-X‚Äôs mission is to become the operating system for private-market investing inside Excel ‚Äî the Bloomberg Terminal of the AI era.

name: Locus
description: Payment infrastructure for AI agents
long_description:
We make your agents pay.

As agents evolve from tools into dependable, autonomous actors, they‚Äôll need the ability to execute open-ended workflows end-to-end.

This inevitably means payments: accessing paywalled data, transacting for services or with other specialist agents. But autonomy requires guardrails. Businesses and developers will need a way to ensure their agents only spend how much and on what they‚Äôre supposed to.

The machine economy is coming, and Locus (YC F25) is building the connector businesses will need to participate. We connect agents securely to funds, letting you define permissions and limits for every transaction. Each payment is traceable, auditable, and fully reconcilable with your existing financial stack.

name: Deeptrace
description: AI agents for on-call
long_description:
At Deeptrace, we‚Äôre building AI agents that investigate and resolve production alerts end-to-end. Deeptrace cuts through the noise, pinpoints root causes instantly, and gives engineering teams back what they need most: the freedom to build instead of firefighting.

In production, we're already seeing a reduction in time spent triaging, investigating, and resolving alerts with some of the fastest growing companies in the world.

name: Aspect
description: AI Visual Understanding for Multimodal Data
long_description:
With our visual understanding engine & platform, Aspect data teams at AI labs.

Aspect processes dense multimodal datasets, providing tools for segmentation, QC, structured schema extraction. 

Companies today have access to Glean and Notion Agents for working with vast text corpuses - Aspect is enabling that for multimodal data.

name: Scoop
description: Automating regulatory submissions for life sciences
long_description: We‚Äôre building AI agents that speed up drug trials by automating the manual consolidation and document prep required for every IND submission. Today, biotechs spend months stitching together reports from contractors and internal teams just to file and get to their first-in-human trial.

name: Hyperspell
description: Memory for AI Agents
long_description:
Hyperspell (YC F25) gives AI agents memory.

It connects to tools like Slack, Gmail, Notion, and Drive so agents can recall, reason, and remember across company knowledge. Developers use Hyperspell‚Äôs API to turn disconnected agents into AI coworkers that understand their work. Conor and Manu founded Hyperspell after building their own workplace agent and seeing how limited AI is without memory. They have over 15 years of experience in machine learning and have scaled API-based products to $30M ARR.

name: Bolna AI
description: Voice AI to enable India's next billion
long_description:
Bolna handles the complexity of voice infra, so enterprises can automate calls faster, better, and cheaper, at scale

Bolna is a Voice AI Orchestration platform purpose-built for Indian enterprises.
Businesses in India run tens of thousands of calls every day - across sales, support, collections, recruitment, and more. Bolna gives them the power to build and deploy Voice AI Agents directly from their transcripts and FAQs, so they can start automating calls immediately.

With Bolna, enterprises get:

1. Full control over agent intelligence, tone, and workflows
2. Cost efficiency at scale with smart routing across providers and price points
3. Enterprise-grade performance on latency, interruptions, multi-language, and multi-accent understanding

name: Nexus
description: We help non-technical teams build AI agents without engineers
long_description: Nexus enables non-technical teams in large organizations to build production-ready AI agents without code.

name: Sylvian
description: Specialized AI Agents.
long_description: Sylvian helps companies build specialized AI agents.

name: Zavo
description: AI Point of Sale for Restaurants
long_description:
Zavo is the first AI-point of sale platform for restaurants.

We unify payments, point of sale, and AI agents into one seamless platform, allowing business to accept payments, manage operations and automate manual processes with Ai. 

From reservations, to payments to point of sale, we have built the full restaurant tech stack in-house with AI automation across all products.

We started Zavo in May 2025, currently over 400 businesses of different sizes use Zavo to accept payments and manage operations

name: MOVEdot
description: AI Agents for Hardware Engineering
long_description: Our agents run hardware engineering tasks that normally take hours or days in just a few minutes, allowing engineers to process 100x more data and information. Our platform allows hardware engineers to orchestrate agents for tasks such as analyzing failures across entire test campaigns, pulling the right data and KPIs from their databases, checking how conditions (like temperature or load) affect performance and reliability, and then document findings in reports and dashboards.

name: Parrot
description: TikTok for language learning
long_description: Parrot is the TikTok for language learning. We turn doomscrolling into fluency with personalized short-form videos. Power users scroll for 6 hours/week on Parrot. Our team of engineers have lived the frustration of ineffective apps and learning methods - we‚Äôre building the first language platform that actually works.

name: Brickwise
description: AI property manager for landlords and estate agents
long_description:
We've built an AI property manager that automates maintenance requests, handling tenant calls and messages 24/7, following up by chasing contractors and resolving issues.

We're based in London, but have over 10 customers throughout the world, from San Francisco to Dubai. We have a reliable sales pipeline, including a >$1m cARR enterprise contract. Since our formation 6 months ago, we have raised over $3M in funding.

Ismail, co-founder & CEO, is an ex-Founder at LiveLink AI, where he raised $3M, growing the platform to editing 150k videos per month. He also built his own prop firm to $500k ARR.

Elias, co-founder & CTO, was an early engineer at a YC backed company, acquired by Google. While a senior engineer at Google for 5 years, he took the product from $50k ARR to >$100m. CS at Bristol, MBA from Imperial.

name: Parse
description: Build an API to interact with any website.
long_description: Parse lets developers build APIs for any website. Unlike traditional scraping tools that rely on slow, expensive headless browsers, Parse reverse-engineers websites' underlying network requests and generates API endpoints automatically. This makes Parse 10-100x faster and cheaper than browser automation,.

name: Structured AI
description: AI workforce for Construction Engineering
long_description:
Structured AI is building the AI workforce for construction design engineering, starting with AI agents that perform quality control on technical documents and drawings. Our agents learn your standards, apply the right building codes, and automatically review your drawings, so you see fewer clashes, fewer inconsistencies, and fewer costly RFIs and change orders.

‚öôÔ∏è Automates QA/QC across mechanical, electrical, structural and more
üß© Used by multi-disciplinary design firms to deliver projects faster with less risk
üöÄ Mission: Free engineers to focus on creative design, not repetitive admin

name: Uplane
description: Replace marketing agencies with AI
long_description:
Uplane replaces marketing agencies with AI. We generate hundreds of ads with matching landing pages and steer the ad spend across channels like Meta, Google, LinkedIn and others. By connecting to CRM and ERP data, Uplane learns what drives profits and continuously improves campaigns.

Companies waste billions on bad ads, mismatched landing pages, and poor budget allocation. Uplane fixes this by replacing a patchwork of agencies, spreadsheets, and siloed tools with one self-improving system. The result: Higher ROAS for enterprises and effortless, expert-level marketing for SMBs.

name: AirCaps
description: The AI copilot for in-person conversations.
long_description:
AirCaps is bringing AI assistance to in-person conversations. 

Our AI-copilot provides live captions, translations, AI meeting notes and insights for in-person conversations in real-time. It's deployed as an app for lightweight AR glasses so you can see visual information overlaid onto your field of vision.

You can think of it like a Zoom AI meeting assistant or Granola, but for in-person conversations, and with the ability to proactively help you in real-time, not just after the conversation.

We‚Äôre building the capture and intelligence layer for the 216 billion daily conversations that happen face-to-face.

We‚Äôve already processed 16,500 hours of real-world conversations and counting. Today, AirCaps assists with 11% of our users‚Äô in-person conversations.

We did $93K in revenue in October and grew 6.5x from September while spending <$3K on marketing (and hit $70K in revenue in the first 2 weeks of November). Our power users average 6h+ daily usage and our day-30 retention is 91%.

We previously went viral (75M+ views on TikTok, 150K+ followers) and have been featured by The New Yorker, WIRED, and Forbes.

Madhav (CEO, Yale CS) has been building in audio and AR since age 13, starting with Google Glass apps and voice assistants for Raspberry Pis. He researched audio AI at the MIT Media Lab. Nirbhay (CTO, Cornell CS) built voice AI on smart glasses in high school and built conversational AI products as the first engineer at 2 YC startups.

name: Brickanta
description: The agentic AI platform for construction estimation & procurement
long_description: Cursor for construction estimation & project management. Brickanta analyzes estimates and project details to help automate admin work, reduce errors and inaccuracy, and accelerate delivery with AI trained on the standardized building protocols.

name: F2
description: The AI platform for private markets investors
long_description:
F2 is the AI platform for private markets investors. Purpose-built for private credit, private equity, and commercial banking, F2 accelerates diligence, underwriting, and portfolio monitoring, helping teams evaluate deals over 60% faster. 

F2 turns unstructured deal data into investment-grade analysis and polished memos in minutes. Unlike general-purpose AI, F2 is built with the domain expertise and depth to handle the most complex financial analysis. Already trusted across thousands of deals, F2 makes collaboration easy and retains historical context, so past work compounds into future wins. 

Headquartered in New York City, F2 is backed by leading investors including NFX, Left Lane Capital, and Y Combinator.

name: Remedy
description: AI Agents for Pharmacies
long_description: Streamline prescription refills, reduce workload, and enhance patient care with intelligent automation.

name: Semiotic
description: Studio-Grade Design at Scale
long_description:
Semiotic builds AI design agents. We‚Äôre starting with agents that build landing pages for fast‚Äëgrowing startups. 

Existing AI website builders didn't make creating websites easier‚Äîthey made creating ugly websites easier. So, companies choose between blue-purple gradient slop or agencies with 3-month waitlists and $100k minimums.

You don't have to choose anymore. 

Start a project: semiotic.com

name: Lapis
description: AI Growth Marketer for Startups
long_description:
Lapis is an AI growth marketer for startups.

Lapis' AI agents create ads, run marketing campaigns, write website content, and track web and LLM analytics so startups can get more customers.

name: Efference
description: We build the eyes and visual cortex for robots.
long_description: Efference builds the eyes and visual cortex for robots. Instead of treating depth as a hardware problem, we use software ‚Äî inspired by how humans see ‚Äî to generate rich and reliable 3D information. This lets us deliver higher performance and greater ease of use at a lower price than existing stereo cameras.

name: Nox Metals
description: The modern factory for fast, low-cost metals.
long_description: Nox Metals is building the fastest metals processing factories in North America. Our software runs quoting, scheduling, and operations to streamline production and reduce cost. We supply America's industrial base with custom-cut material at unmatched speed and efficiency.

name: Digipals
description: The future of Social in the age of AI
long_description:
Social networks are dead. Social media became more media than social. My friends aren't on social media anymore - it's one third ads, one third content from strangers, and one third AI slop. Our social lives are fragmented across dozens of different apps - iMessage, WhatsApp, Find My, Partiful, and Venmo. 

Digipals is the first AI-native social operating system that improves our relationships with friends. We built ambient AI agents that use social context from our location, calendar, and photos to take action and write code in our group chats. We are the last social platform anyone will ever need.

Launch Video
https://youtu.be/KW2tjLl6sxM

name: Blue
description: The first voice assistant that can control every app on your iPhone
long_description:
Blue is the first voice assistant on iOS and Android that can control every app on your phone, so you can get work done hands-free.

It reads and replies to messages and email across apps, attaches photos and files, books and pays, manages calendar items, and more.

Unlike assistants that stop at answers or timers, Blue taps, types, and swipes inside your existing apps with no app-specific integrations. On iPhone, a tiny USB-C plug-in (‚ÄúBud‚Äù) provides precise input control so Blue can act on your behalf. (Android support is in testing.)

Blue is already in real-world use: people are clearing inboxes, paying bills from email, sharing files, and moving through routine flows while their hands are busy.

The team brings complementary experience at scale: Omar Abdelaziz led Google Assistant‚Äôs transition to LLMs and holds one of earliest patents in LLM-based computer control; Peter Krogh spent decades designing voice-first dialog systems and was most recently a design lead at Google DeepMind building actions for Gemini Live; Muhammad Farhan Hossain helped ship Apple Vision Pro, is named on dozens of hardware/systems patents, and has led products from prototype to mass production.

We‚Äôve built systems used by billions. Now we‚Äôre on to defining the next era of computing.

name: Mixy
description: Make mashups without knowing how to DJ
long_description:
Live out your DJ dreams with Mixy, the mind-blowing music app that lets you mash-up any song in seconds.

‚Åï Add your songs
‚Åï Instantly blend vocals and beats
‚Åï Play and share your mashup anywhere

There‚Äôs no limit to your imagination!

‚Åï Launched to #1 in Music on June 19th
‚Åï 1.5M users in 3 months
‚Åï 15M mashups made and growing

name: Paloma
description: AI-native CRM for putting post-sales operations on autopilot
long_description: We unify your contracts, service consumption, and customer relationship context so that your revenue, success and sales teams can operate from the same ground truth. With everything centralized, you can proactively react to customer signals for upsell and churn while billing is seamlessly handled in the background.

name: Uplift AI
description: Foundational Voice Models for regional languages
long_description:
We build Voice Models for regional languages (like Urdu, Bengali, Greek etc) and make them available through simple APIs and SDKs. 
Developers use us to create Voice-first digital experiences (eg. Voice eCommerce, Voice Banking, Voice AI Tutors etc).

We gather our own data, develop our own labelling tools, train our own models, and design our own voice infra. This fully integrated approach enables us to offer the best models and the best developer experience for regional languages.

---

People who would previously never use certain digital services (like online ordering), actually use the service when they are given an intuitive Voice based interface.
We believe that Voice Interfaces will onboard 100s of millions of new users onto digital services; and double the addressable market for technology companies. 
Uplift AI will provide the best models to create these Voice Interfaces for 60% of the world's population that only speaks their regional language and represents 42 trillion dollars in GDP.

name: RealRoots
description: AI social app for women
long_description: This is where real friendships begin. Women use our mobile app to talk to Lisa, our AI matchmaker, and get set up for fun social experiences with compatible new friends, all planned and coordinated by AI.

name: Luminal
description: Making AI run fast on any hardware.
long_description:
Luminal builds an ML framework and compiler that generates GPU code.
Our stack 10x's model speed while simplifying deployment and cutting idle GPU costs

Github: https://github.com/luminal-ai/luminal
Discord: https://discord.gg/APjuwHAbGy

name: Freya
description: Voice AI for Enterprises

name: burnt
description: Agentic Operating System for Food Supply Chain
long_description:
Food Supply Chain companies have been using legacy ERPs for decades. Everyone knows these are necessary evils that essentially run the business but take up a lot of operational capacity. They are not about to just rip and replace their existing system that runs their whole business with a system that takes years to implement. Imagine if they could implement AI that runs the ERP for them, in weeks?

Burnt‚Äôs building an agentic OS for the Food Supply Chain with AI Agents for each department. 

Our AI Agent, Ozai, has started by replacing the whole order management job function at food distribution companies, so that sales and customer service teams can focus on what matters - the customer. Ozai monitors all incoming messages (emails, phone calls, voicemails, whatsapp, fax etc.), figures out if it's an order, learns each customer's habits, shorthand, and favorite products, picks up on any prep notes, and enters it straight into the existing ERP. It'll even go back to the customers on your behalf when it's not sure about something, clarify things and carry on working. 

The more it sees, the smarter it gets.

name: Avent
description: AI agents for industrial commerce
long_description:
Avent helps manufacturers and industrial distributors run quoting and order entry on autopilot. 

Our AI agents manage sales inboxes, build quotes from past pricing and tribal knowledge, and keep records up to date in existing ERPs.

name: Ruvo
description: The Global Dollar App for Brazil
long_description:
Ruvo is a global account for receiving, holding, and moving money between USD and BRL.

We connect Pix, crypto, and Visa so you can receive USD from abroad, convert between USD and BRL in minutes, send money to the U.S., spend worldwide, and save in digital dollars with yield ‚Äî all in one place.

Ruvo supports both personal (CPF) and business (CNPJ) accounts, with low fees, strong security, and direct Pix settlement.

Formerly known as Cacao.

name: Veritus
description: AI agents for the consumer lending industry
long_description:
Veritus is a omni-channel platform for deploying AI agents for loan servicing and collections, including inbound and outbound voice agents. Our agents negotiate repayment plans, follow up across channels, and drive recoveries with zero human involvement.

By combining cutting edge voice AI with deep regulatory compliance and vertical specialization we're able to drastically reduce the cost-to-collect while increasing recovery rates.

name: Outrove
description: Ultra-realistic AI Recruiter
long_description: Outrove is the world‚Äôs most realistic AI recruiter, with a human-appearing interview agent that has both video and audio and can join Google Meet calls.

name: NOSO LABS
description: Build AI agents for field technicians to diagnose and sell 10x better
long_description: In the home services industry, field technicians are expected to handle three key tasks: diagnosing issues, making sales, and completing paperwork. It's rare to find individuals who excel at all three. We build AI agents to support technicians by improving diagnostic accuracy and helping them capture sales opportunities.

name: Vulcan Technologies
description: AI regulatory drafting and compliance
long_description:
Vulcan uses AI to map every law, regulation, and court case in America, allowing government agencies and businesses to replace massive consulting projects with instant automated analyses. We call this "intelligent legal cartography."

In 3 months, we went from zero customers to Virginia's Executive Order 51, requiring all state agencies to use Vulcan. We are now live with the U.S. Department of Education, a regulatory reform PAC in South Carolina, and have a pipeline of several additional state and federal agencies and major enterprises.

Our initial agency partners use legal cartography to draft lawful regulations, respond to public comments on regulations, and instantly generate mandatory cost-benefit analyses.

We have both public and private sector visions. In the public sector: we endeavor to automate the entire regulatory process end-to-end; replacing the consulting industrial complex with software. In the private sector: we plan to automate regulatory compliance, tackling the $4 trillion regulatory cost on the U.S. economy.

name: Bizzy AI
description: Bizzy works 24/7 so you never miss a lead.
long_description: Bizzy handles your calls, captures and qualifies leads, and books appointments directly into your CRM. It understands your services better than a receptionist would, routes and escalates calls, and syncs with your existing tools to incorporate complex workflows, all so your team can focus on servicing leads, not qualifying them.

name: Spotlight Realty
description: AI powered brokerage reducing residential rental commissions in NYC‚Ä¶
long_description: We are a full-service sell-side residential brokerage that lists and markets your properties. We also screen and schedule tenants showings with our AI agent for a third of the normal commission.

name: Interfere
description: Build software that never breaks
long_description: The greatest product teams use Interfere to spend more time building what‚Äôs next instead of maintaining what was.

name: Munify
description: The Cross-Border Neobank for the Middle East
long_description: Munify is the cross-border Neobank for the Middle East and its diaspora. Instantly open a USD account, get a virtual card, and send money home at the best rates, all from one app.

name: RowFlow
description: Replacing forms with AI conversations
long_description:
RowFlow replaces clunky web forms with natural conversations that run over text, slack, or wherever your users are. Our platform increases your form‚Äôs response rates while cutting your internal overhead in half. 

With RowFlow, you can take any existing form and instantly convert it into an AI-powered conversation. New flows launch in minutes and reach respondents over your preferred channel or embedded chat. We guide the exchange, follow up automatically, and return clean structured data without extra work from your team.

Forms power billions of business interactions yearly. Whether it‚Äôs forms for client intake, registrations, compliance, feedback, or surveys, they all follow the same painful pattern: low conversion, messy data, and frustrated users. Teams have long tolerated forms only because there's been no scalable alternative for collecting structured information from people - until now. Our goal is for RowFlow to become the new default way for how organizations collect user data in an AI-first world.

name: TectoAI
description: A Platform for AI Governance
long_description: We help your company identify roles that can be filled by agentic AI tools, onboard them quickly, monitor their performance and behavior post deployment, ensure they remain compliant, and aligned with regulations. Tecto is building the governance platform for managing the AI stack!

name: Duranium
description: Reshoring critical metal production
long_description:
China and Russia control the world‚Äôs critical minerals. We can produce Titanium, Magnesium, Aluminum, Zirconium & Hafnium in the U.S. more profitably than any existing process, and carbon neutrally via co-production.

Carbochlorination is the primary process for producing critical metals like titanium, hafnium, and zirconium, and was once the standard for magnesium. The problem: conventional carbochlorination relies on purchasing carbon feedstocks, wastes valuable byproducts, and is highly CO‚ÇÇ-intensive.

Duranium changes this with a novel reactor that recycles CO‚ÇÇ emissions back into feedstock (CO) while generating a valuable co-product (bleaching agents). This closed loop slashes emissions and delivers Chinese-level metal pricing without subsidies ‚Äî unlocking the full potential of carbochlorination for U.S. critical mineral production.

name: Perspectives Health
description: Automating away admin for behavioral health clinics
long_description:
America is facing an addiction and mental health crisis. We're building a suite of AI agents to automate away the tasks that occupy half of the time and resources of behavioral health clinics‚Äîdocumentation, compliance, audits, and more.

We save time, money, and mental bandwidth so that clinicians can stop chasing insurance reimbursements and go back to saving lives.

name: Modelence
description: All-in-one TypeScript cloud for production AI apps
long_description:
You built the demo in a weekend. Now you need auth, a prod-grade database, real-time events, AI observability, cron jobs, email, monitoring‚Ä¶ and you needed them yesterday.

We spent a decade at our previous startup, building a platform while scaling to millions of users and customers like Meta & Netflix. Now we put that into an open-source framework, so others wouldn‚Äôt have to do the same from scratch.

Modelence is a batteries-included framework that abstracts away boilerplate so you can just focus on building your product logic and nothing else - it‚Äôs like Next.js + Vercel + Supabase on a single platform, built for full-stack TypeScript.

Shipping production apps is much harder than building a prototype that runs locally and 95% of all production apps share the same building blocks. We did a massive amount of work on our previous platforms that was not specific to our product, and we‚Äôve created Modelence to abstract that away:
- Authentication
- Database setup
- Hosting / CDN
- AI integration (LLM observability, prompts)
- Real-time events
- Cron jobs
- Email service
- Monitoring
- Analytics
- Admin dashboards

Andrej Karpathy recently posted about this same exact problem:
https://x.com/karpathy/status/1905051558783418370

and explained it further in his YC AI Startup School talk:
https://youtu.be/LCEmiRjPEtQ?feature=shared&t=1940

name: Magnetic
description: AI Tax Preparer for CPA firms
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.

name: Fleetline
description: Optimizing fleet planning with data driven algorithms
long_description: Fleetline is building the first complete-context algorithmic load planner for¬†mid to large-sized trucking fleets. Today‚Äôs dispatchers face an overwhelming task: balancing regulations, customer demands, live fleet data, and individual driver needs, all while coordinating across siloed tools and teams. Mistakes run rampant, and each mistake is thousands of dollars. Even the select fleets using algorithms that have fleet-wide context struggle: the outputs are rigid, hard to interpret, and are blind to real-world nuances like driver preferences and schedule exceptions. Fleetline solves this by combining advanced optimization with LLMs that can easily adapt algorithms to each fleet‚Äôs needs and capture driver-specific information. The result is smarter planning truly optimized for every fleet and its drivers.

name: Clodo
description: Vibe GTM. Execute your outbound ideas with just a prompt
long_description:
Clodo is built for Vibe GTM. Find and reach your next customers with just a prompt. 
Execute your outbound ideas at the speed of thought.

name: stagewise
description: The frontend coding agent for real codebases.
long_description:
stagewise builds an open-source frontend coding agent for real codebases. We enable backend devs, designers and product managers to build pretty and functional web apps in a simple and visually guided manner - no matter the used tech stack.

stagewise lives right inside your browser, makes changes in your local codebase and is compatible with all kinds of frameworks and setups - allowing it to be retrofitted into any existing project. Our agent enables you to show and tell what you want to change - all while using your app on localhost and without having to switch to external tools. Making changes is as easy as selecting elements, giving a simple prompt like ‚Äúmake it green and put it in the top right corner‚Äù, and immediately seeing the result.

We're two founders from Germany who met while working at a B2B SaaS startup. With Glenn's background in building dev tools for enterpries (Rheinmetall, Miele), as well as Julians experience in building web apps used by thousands (saasmetrix, strukto.io), we have the unique blend of experience and product sense needed to build this.

After making our initial launch with the open-sourced toolbar that puts your favorite coding agent right inside your browser and going viral with it, we‚Äôre now launching a high-speed coding agent dedicated to frontend development - taking our product and the experience of our users to the next level.

Our vision is to replace frontend devs completely, by gradually enabling both the backend devs, but also less technical designers and product managers to create well-designed applications. We start with developers who lack design experience, but our ultimate goal is to change how products are built.

name: Flywheel AI
